nodes.text: Dream-walkers were a sub-sect of Voss Mystics outcasts, who practiced the ritual of Dream-walking. Not entirely embraced by the Voss society, they had an encampment in the caves beneath Voss-Ka called the Mind healer's grove.
Around 3640 BBY, Sith Lord Kallig approached the dream-walker Asa-Ku, looking for the information on the Forbidden Ritual, known only to them.
The Dream-walkers appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Voss.
